title: what name of the font this might be?
content:
Hello,  
I'm surfing the web (without big success) in search for the font of the sign in the attached image. I've got only those letters. If you know its name, it would be great.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621165401im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font2_tiny_4037.gif)
author: veontomo

comments.content: Looks like a distorted [Gill Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621165401/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/gill+sans) Italic to me, may from a captcha.

I've just had a look at Gill Sans. It did not seem to be very similar. My reference here is the inscription of letter "p" - in the font I'm looking for it is too much different from Gill Sans. Probably, it is too distorted :-)
It's incredible! You did it! The letter p is the same! Compliments! It's pity that other letters do not coincide.

No need to look further, all letters coincide perfectly. You just have to pick the [Gill Sans Bold **Italic**](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621165401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/std-bold-italic/). They're simply distorted (by a captcha) as I said in my first post.  
a: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/std-bold-italic/glyphs.html#g...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621165401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/std-bold-italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/544620/66 "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/std-bold-italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/544620/66")  
c: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/std-bold-italic/glyphs.html#g...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621165401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/std-bold-italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/544620/68 "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/std-bold-italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/544620/68")  
S: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/std-bold-italic/glyphs.html#g...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621165401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/std-bold-italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/544620/52 "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/std-bold-italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/544620/52")  
z: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/std-bold-italic/glyphs.html#g...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621165401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/std-bold-italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/544620/91 "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/std-bold-italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/544620/91")

Good eyes, Ryuk.

Let's use such x-ray vision every time any Dafont (or other free font site) suggestion comes up... :-)

hhp
thanks a lot! Now I understand what you were saying and understand that you were absolutely right!
